title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: Paragon says it canceled contracts with Italy over government’s refusal to investigate spyware attack on journalist
items.description: The Italian government claims that accepting Paragon’s help would have compromised national security and classified information.

items.title: Typhur Dome 2 Review (2025): Fast and Bulbous
items.description: Typhur’s futuristic air fryer cooks faster, keeps perfect temperature, and can char chicken or bake a pizza. But it’ll cost you.

items.title: Why Silicon Valley Needs Immigration
items.description: On this episode of Uncanny Valley, the hosts discuss how limiting foreign-born workers hurts Silicon Valley.

items.title: The Bleach Community Is Ready for RFK Jr. To Make Their Dreams Come True
items.description: Online communities dedicated to the use of a toxic bleach solution to treat everything from cancer to autism believe Robert F. Kennedy Jr. is interest...

items.title: Apple’s new Workout Buddy helps you sweat smarter
items.description: Apple has launched at its WWDC 2025 conference Workout Buddy, an AI workout coach. The AI tool gathers data from both your current workout and your fi...

items.title: Mitra Chem is raising $50M for its cheaper, domestic battery materials
items.description: Mitra Chem is developing materials to make lithium-iron-phosphate (LFP) batteries store more energy.

items.title: Apple AirPods get new features, including studio-quality audio and a camera remote
items.description: Apple's AirPods are getting a couple of new features and gestures, the Cupertino-based tech company announced at its Worldwide Developers Conference (...

items.title: It’s Time to Kill Siri
items.description: After almost 10 years, Google Assistant was recently axed in favor of Gemini. Siri gets a bad rap—now is the time for Apple to make a change too.

items.title: Apple unveils watchOS 26 with new design, wrist-flick gesture, and AI Workout Buddy feature
items.description: Apple unveiled watchOS 26 with new design, wrist-flick gesture, and AI Workout Buddy feature during WWDC 2025.

items.title: A Researcher Figured Out How to Reveal Any Phone Number Linked to a Google Account
items.description: Phone numbers are a goldmine for SIM swappers. A researcher found how to get this precious piece of information through a clever brute-force attack.
